name: get_token_price_history_between_dates
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool uniblock.
Tool description: Unified Blockchain API, use one, use them all. 

 

From NFTs, DeFi, Wallets, GameFi, Tokens, or simply launching contracts, we've got tools to help build them both easier and faster.

Uniblockis a suite of blockchain tooling to support developers in building any blockchain project.
API description: Retrieves the price history of a token between two specified dates in USD.

startdate.description: Returns the chart starting at this timestamp. Unix timestamp in seconds.

chainid.description: The specific network the desired token resides on.

address.description: The token address of the desired coin.

enddate.description: Returns the chart ending at this timestamp. Unix timestamp in seconds.
